metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6684 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the RedCloth library 4.2.9 for Ruby and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a javascript: URI.

criterions.comment: ruby-redcloth: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
